The graduate student committee is composed of one or more representatives from each LTER site who help to maintain a sense of community and connection among students at LTER sites. Grad Reps are servant-leaders who help communicate student issues and perspectives to faculty and staff and vice-versa. The information in this manual will help new graduate students representatives to get oriented to the role and expectations.
